attributes.action: All petitions over a resonable number must be replied to with level raising with number.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Except for petitions rejected for clearly stated and appealable reasons.
All petition with more than 10,000 signatories, must be responded to, those with over 100,000 this must be made by a minister, and any over 1,000,000 the petition and responce must be made to Parliment

rejection.details: Petitions about the petition system are not appropriate. Please send feedback to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
